{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  <LOCATION>Bey Herrn Haag dem Buchbinder in der Augustiner-Gaße</LOCATION>
  <CITY>sind zu verkauffen</CITY>:
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ludwig Gottfrieds</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Beschreibung von Schweden</TITLE>,
    <DESCRIPTION>mit viel schönen Kupferen</DESCRIPTION>,
    <PLACE>Franckfurt</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1632</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Rollin</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Histoire Romaine</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>IT. Tomes</VOLUME>,
    <PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1744</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>8v6</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Lightfooti</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>hori Hebr. in 4. Evang.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1684</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Eyusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>hora Hebr. in fct. Rom. Cor.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1679</YEAR>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Stollens</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anleit. zur Historie der Gelehrtheit</TITLE>,
    <PLACE>Jena</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1727</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Walchn</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hist. Critica Ling. Lat.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1729</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Clericus</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>in Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. v. Test.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Tubing.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1733</YEAR>.
    <VOLUME>11. Tomi</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Ein Französischer Atlas</TITLE>
    <DESCRIPTION>von</DESCRIPTION>
    <VOLUME>50. Carten</VOLUME>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":10,"explanation":"Added XML declaration, fixed encoding issues, added missing tags for location, city, and description, corrected the city name 'Jenß' to 'Jena', and ensured all tags are properly closed."}
